title: S&P 500 pops into positive territory as investors shake off weak China data to buy energy, tech stocks
text:
No Barbie Dream House or turkey for Christmas, but U.K. may get an interest rate hike

As price pressures increase in the U.K., the Bank of England's governor has all but promised an interest rate increase soon. See full story.

The tech earnings boom is fizzling out, as Apple and Amazon face the same issues as everyone else

The boom in Big Tech has been a huge part of Wall Street's surge in the past year, but it now appears that other sectors beyond semiconductors are as susceptible to the supply chain problems hurting other industries. See full story.

Here's what's in Democrats' big social-spending bill — for now

As the party tries to reach agreement, here are key proposed categories for the spending. See full story.

‘Green' ETFs are minting some green as the energy crisis sparks a boomlet in alternatives

Every week we highlight the most timely exchange-traded fund news, from new launches to inflows and performance See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

‘It has been a long effort to negotiate a settlement agreement, but his estranged wife keeps asking for more.' See full story.
